constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 66 (Friday, April 16, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. JACOBS of New York:
H.R. 2625.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article 1, Section 8 of the United States Constitution.
[Page H1891]

latestAction.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Economic Development, Public Buildings, and Emergency Management.

title: To amend title 40, United States Code, to include Wyoming County in the region covered by the Northern Border Regional Commission, and for other purposes.
